Steps.Message: Update at 08:03 - We're very sorry we've had to switch off your electricity. Our engineers have turned off the power in the Kelly Close area for safety so they can complete urgent repairs to a fault on our underground cabling. Our estimated time to have your power back on is between 11:30 and 12:30. If you'd like more information about why we sometimes have to switch power off to work; here's a short video https://bit.ly/3cYez0V. We'll keep you updated with progress.

We became aware of a power cut at 04:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: Due to a faulty piece of underground network equipment we had to turn off your power.
